description:
تطبيق طرب الفيديو هو واحد من افضل تطبيقات الايفون والايباد المجانية المتوفرة على الآب ستور التي يمكنك الاعتماد عليها فمن خلال هذا التطبيق يمكنك تحميل مقاطعك المفضلة من الفيديو والملفات الى جهازك فهو التطبيق الأسهل من بين تطبيقات تحميل الفيديوهات المتوفرة لأجهزة ايفون .

حيث يتيح لك التطبيق أن تقوم بتحميل وتنزيل أي ملف من خلال الضغط على زر التحميل ليتم نقل الملف الى التطبيق بكل سهولة وسرعة .
التطبيق يتيح لك تنزيل العديد من الجودات المختلفة من الفيديوهات ، فضلاً عن ان التطبيق يمنح المستخدمين خاصية تحويل الفيديو الي صوت Mp3 .

ويمكن للمستخدمين الاستمتاع بمشاهدة و الاستماع الى مقاطع فيديو و موسيقى و تشغيلها ايضا في الخلفية من غير انترنت كما يمكنك التطبيق من مشاركة ونشر فيديوهاتك المحملة على تطبيق سناب شات من غير ظهور علامة فوق الفيديو انه من مكتبة الصور فبالتالي سوف يظهر الفيديو أنه تم تصويره الآن .

طرب الفيديو تطبيق مميز جداً يحتوي على العديد من الميزات التي ستمكنك من :
- تنزيل الفيديوهات من DropBox أو GoogleDrive أو icloud إلى جهاز iPhone أو iPad . يمكنك مشاهدة مقاطع الفيديو التي تم تنزيلها في وضع عدم الاتصال! ومشاركتها عن طريق السوشال ميديا مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي .
-واجهة الاستخدام بسيطة جداً.
-إتاحة التعديل على الفيديوهات المحملة من استديو الصور الخاص بك
-  إمكانية فصل الموسيقى من الصوت أو الفيديو كل على حده .
- ازالة الصوت البشري من أي مقطع صوتي أو مقطع فيديو .
- إمكانية قفل التطبيق للخصوصية  . 
- إمكانية وضع ملصقات (ايموجي) على الفيديو .
- إمكانية الكتابة والرسم على الفيديو .
- (تسريع / إبطاء) الفيديو حسب اختيارك .
- قص مقطع الفيديو للحصول على البعد المناسب .
- يمكنك قص الفيديو وتقطيعه بسهولة للحصول على مدة فيديو قصيرة .
- يمكنك عكس مقطع الفيديو بشكل كامل .
-حفظ نسخة احتياطية من بياناتك على الايكلاود .
- إزالة الصوت " كتم " من اي فيديو أو مقطع .
- يتيح لك البرنامج بتنزيل عدة ملفات في نفس الوقت .
- يتميز مشغل الموسيقى في البرنامج ب سهولة الاستخدام ووضوح أدوات تحكم الplayer  
- يمكن للمشتركين التواصل مع فريق الدعم الخاص بالتطبيق عبر اعدادات التطبيق .
- يستطيع المستخدم ترتيب الملفات المحملة من خلال خاصية تحديد ملفاتي وترتبيها حسب الأحرف الأبجدية ، لعبت مؤخرا ، حمّلت مؤخرا .
- يمكن استعادة الملفات المحذوفة من سلة المهملات في التطبيق قبل ٤٠ يوم من تاريخ حذفها .
-إمكانية إعادة مشاهدة الملفات المنزلة بدون الاتصال بالإنترنت.
- يمكن من خلال التطبيق معرفة اسم الأغنية من خلال Shazam والانتقال اليها بكل سهولة .
- يدعم اللغات : العربية والإنجليزية .
- اضافة قفل الفيديو لمنع الوصول إلى ميزات شاشة مشغل الموسيقي .
وجه عام فإن هذا التطبيق هو تطبيق رائع يجعل من السهل جدا الوصول الى كل الفيديوهات الموجودة على هاتفك وكل ما يلزم  للتعديل علی فيديوهاتك الاصلية ومشاركتها على مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي مع أصدقائك .

Spotify Stats App

Discover your Spotify music history by logging in with your Spotify account.

Stats for Spotify examines your music collection and provides detailed statistics on your listening habits. Explore your favorite genres, albums, playlists, and performers. With just one tap, you can open any album, artist, or song directly in Spotify.

How to Check Your Spotify Stats

Simply install our app and log in to your Spotify account. In the app, navigate to the "My Spotify Stats" section to view your personalized statistics.

Stats for Spotify allows you to view your music statistics, including:

- Your favorite albums, artists, and songs
- Information about songs' popularity, danceability, and other characteristics
- Personalized analytics to discover the popularity rankings of each song, artist, and album on Spotify
- Recommended songs to help you discover new music

Free Download

Sleep timer

Customized playlist

- Sort your favorite tracks as you like

Looking to identify a song? Song Finder is your ultimate song identifier and music recognition app, helping you quickly identify music, get the song title, discover artist details, play or watch official music videos.

- What song is this
Have you ever asked: “What song is playing right now?”
With Song Finder, you’ll instantly get the name of the song, artist name, album, and more. It’s fast, accurate, and perfect for identifying music from anywhere.

- How to use Song Finder to recognize music or identify a song name:
1. Open the app and tap the blue button to start
2. Hold your phone near the music source, or:
- Play a song on your device
- Upload an audio or video file from your library
3. Wait a few seconds while Song Finder listens
4. Instantly see full song info, song name, artist, top tracks, album, and more

- Identify music by sound
Yes, you can easily find music by sound. Whether it's a song playing on the radio, TV, streaming apps, or in a video, Song Finder can recognize a song by sound in just a few seconds of listening.

Perfect for music lovers, Song Finder helps you:
- Discover new songs
- Find music by sound
- Build their music collection with ease.

Growing your music career on Audiomack just got so much easier with our Creator App - you can do everything from uploading tracks and managing your releases, to seeing your artist stats and messaging your fans all from your phone now. 

Upload as many tracks as you want - we have unlimited storage for artists, no subscription or payment required. (MP3s, WAV, M4A, AAC, and other local files)
View stats on your releases (plays, favorites, playlist adds, and re-ups)
See what cities and countries your music is getting the most traction in, and who your top fans are
See what your fans have to say about your tracks and directly reply to comments
Message your followers
Easily market your music with our Promote Tab (we auto-generate custom images for you to share on social media)
Earn money from your streams directly from us through our Artist Monetization Program, no distributor or label required
Monetize beyond streams - release music early and have fans pay to listen before the official release

Audiomack is the best app for emerging artists to be discovered - we care about what artists are bubbling next, not just what’s big now, and artists like Yeat, Rod Wave, and Joeboy launched their careers on Audiomack. We want to help you get discovered by your future fans - we have a global network of curators who hand select music to trend, and we have programs like Tastemakers where we engage music lovers worldwide to help find cool new artists.

Use of the Audiomack App and free upload feature is subject to your agreement with our Privacy Policy/TOS.

Introducing the Premier Music Application for Discerning Audiophiles



Welcome to an exceptional musical experience tailored to satisfy your every auditory craving. Allow us to introduce a world of limitless harmonies, meticulous catalog management, swift retrieval capabilities, and a cutting-edge in-app music player, all easily accessible. Prepare for a deeply immersive voyage into the realm of music with a selection of unparalleled features:



Unparalleled Music Selection:



Embark on a boundless auditory journey with our extensive and diverse music library, designed to cater to all preferences and emotional states. From chart-toppers to hidden gems, our collection ensures an endless stream of fresh discoveries.



Library Curation:



Effortlessly craft your personal music collection by marking favorites and accessing recently played tracks with unmatched ease. Maintain absolute control and organization of your music like never before.



Lightning-Fast Music Search:



Bid farewell to endless scrolling as you locate your preferred songs, albums, or artists with our lightning-quick search functionality. Simply type and tap to revel in instant results.



Lockscreen Music Mastery:



Seize command of your musical experience, even when your device is locked. Seamlessly skip tracks, adjust the volume, and pause effortlessly.



Comprehensive In-App Music Player:



Our advanced music player presents a spectrum of features to enhance your listening experience. Enjoy options such as repeat and shuffle, enabling you to fine-tune your playlist to your exact liking.



Premium Subscription Benefits:



Upgrade to our Pro Version to elevate your music journey further. With a Pro subscription, you'll relish an ad-free atmosphere, enabling you to dive into your music uninterrupted. Our subscription offerings include:



- Monthly Subscription: $1.99 USD per month
- Lifetime Subscription: $12.99 USD  one time



Please note that pricing may fluctuate in different regions due to local currency conversions.

- Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account upon confirmation of purchase.
- Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the current period ends.
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period, with the cost of renewal clearly outlined.
- Manage and cancel subscriptions through your App Store account settings after purchase.
- Any unused portion of a free trial, if offered, will be forfeited upon purchasing a subscription.
- To cancel a subscription during the free trial period, use the subscription settings in your iTunes account at least 24 hours before the trial ends. For more information, visit http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098



Your Privacy, Our Priority:



Rest assured that your privacy is paramount to us. By utilizing our app, you concur with our stringent Privacy Policy and Terms of Use. For a detailed understanding of our policies, please refer to the following links:

Bring out the singer in you on StarMaker——A popular karaoke & social singing app with 50M＋users globally! Whether you are a passionate singing enthusiast or a seasoned professional, StarMaker allows you to refine the voice and showcase your music talents. You can sing on your own, duet with friends, or sing alongside recordings of popular artists. Record your voice, create your MVs, and enhance your voice with professional audio editors. 

Sing Karaoke Songs
No matter you like pop or hip-hop, R&B or folk, jazz or blues, just pick your favorite songs from millions of songs, sing along with the high-quality backing music and rolling lyrics, and edit your recordings with voice effects and video filters. You can also duet with top artists and go Live to broadcast your music concerts and win likes and fans like a superstar! 

Professional Sound Effects
Supported by professional music team, the audio editor function offers you the chance to get varied sound effects when recording songs. Add sound effects you like, adjust the pitch based on your vocal range, and denoise or reduce latency to have a smooth and professional vocal performance.

With the popular singing app and social music community, you can: 
+ Pick your favorite songs and latest hits from millions of local and international songs with rolling lyrics and high-quality backing tracks.
+ Record with professional audio editor, using pitch correction and special effects like Karaoke, Studio, Superstar, Gig, Pop, etc.
+ Get real-time pitch feedback and Radar Chart Analysis of your voice to learn how to improve pitch precision, rhythm, singing techniques, emotion, and song choice.
+ Edit your selfie music videos with beautiful filters like Vintage, Cream, Sunset, Flower, Spring, etc.
+ Use video templates to create unique MVs with lyrics.
+ Share your covers on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, WhatsApp & more. Listen and record the music moments.
+ Sing and listen to songs with new friends in Live Duet to connect with the world seamlessly through music.
+ Host your online karaoke parties with friends in Party Rooms.
+ Join a "Family" social community to stay connected with other music lovers with similar tastes.

Cancel Renewal: You can manage your automatic subscription service or disenable it by going to "Settings" -->"iTunes Store and App Store"-->"Apple ID"-->"Check Apple ID"-->"Subscriptions" from Apple. It can be cancelled  24 hours before the end of each billing period, and no fee will be deducted within 24 hours before the expiration.

Information about the auto-renewal of subscription:
– Subscription unlocks access to all the app’s features.
– Billed weekly, monthly, quarterly, or annually based on the selected plan.
– Subscription with a free trial will be automatically renewed to a paid subscription.
– Payment will be charged by Apple at confirmation of purchase.
